question: According to its nutritional info, a bag of popcorn has 275 calories per serving. If a 100 ounces bag has 5 servings, how many ouncess can you eat if your daily calorie target is 2150 and you have already consumed 1875 calories?
answer:
If the total calorie target is 2150 and I have consumed 1875 calories then I have 2150-1875 = <<2150-1875=275>>275 calories left to eat
If each serving of popcorn has 275 calories and I only have 275 calories left to eat, then I can only eat 275/275 of a serving = 1 of a serving
We also know that a 100 ounces bag of popcorn has 5 servings, hence each serving has 100 ounces/5 = <<100/5=20>>20 ouncess
If I can only eat 1 of a serving, then I can eat only 20 ounces * 1 = 20 ouncess
#### 20
